content: 6 single_crochet decrease 6 single_crochet 13 round 54-56 13 single_crochet 3 rounds 13 round 57 7 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet 12 round 58-60 12 single_crochet 3 rounds 12 round 61 7 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet 11 round 62 11 single_crochet 3 rounds 11 place a rattle or squezzy ball inside the body stuff body lightly and ear firmly stuff the body lightly with filling and place a rattle or squeezy ball optional inside stuff the ear firmly with filling round 63 8 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet 10 round 64 decrease x 5 5 slip_stitch in next st fasten_off and leave a yarn tail weave the yarn tail through the front loops of each stitch and pull it tight to close then weave in the yarn end 10 second ear between the ears there will be 3 stitches on each side count 3 single_crochet from the first ear and attach the yarn with a slip knot on the 4th stitch this will be the beginning of second ear leave a long tail before you attach it you will use this yarn tail to sew the hole between the ears 3 single_crochet on each side between the ears start second ear from here round 50 15 single_crochet 15 round 51-64 same pattern as first ear slip_stitch in next st fasten_off and leave a yarn tail weave the yarn tail through the front loops of each stitch and pull it tight to close then weave in the yarn end assembly sew the hole between the ears with the yarn tail weave in the yarn end embroider the face with black and pink yarn sew the cheeks between rounds 33 and 37 11 congratulation your beba bunny is done thank you for making her please do share your gorgeous work don t forget to tag me on instagram @handmade_by_halime
